verbs.description: [ARG0: atlas growers] [V: secures] [ARG1: cannabis production expansion site] [ARGM-LOC: on vancouver island] edmonton alberta july 17 2018- atlas biotechnologies inc the parent company of atlas growers ltd is pleased to announce that it has entered into an acquisition agreement with coastline canada inc to acquire a 50 equity interest in coastline subject to completion of financing construction is planned to commence in the next 2 months the new facility atlas biotechnologies edmonton coastline board of directors vancouver island atlas growers ltd atlas biotechnologies inc atlas growers atlas president ceo coastline canada atlas team cannabis vancouver atlas coastline canada inc
